channel.title: PwnedScape Revolution
channel.description:
[center][u][b]PwnedScape Revolution![/b][/u][/center] [b]Note: I do use Deltascape, don't care. I've added so much to it that I can say i coded at least 35% lol.[/b] *Features Added -A new quest to unlock a new shop and a new area. (Lame) -A ton of interfaces for 4/5 mini games -fully working barrows with dig, kc, and chest spawn. -60% caslte wars with correct interface(no pic) -fixed some glitches, 50% done fixing the following glitch to stop noclipping. -Edited 70% the Lunar gfx's and emotes. -Removed the Attack option out of wild. (appears in fight pits, c wars, and the wild.) *Client side - Added lunar to the client with the help of a tut - Added fully working login and log out with the help of a tut - Added peity and chiv with the help of a tut. That's all I can think right of now, I'll post more Here are some pics! *future to do list. -Finish up CW -Add full clan chat system(notice the sprite...) -Add a few more quests. -fix all the quest to make them longer and more detailed. -Fix the rest of the following glitch [center][b]Over all random pix[/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk246/pwnedurmom/screenshots1.jpg[/img][/center] [center][b]Interfaces..[/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk246/pwnedurmom/screenshots3.jpg[/img][/center] [center][b]Vengence Other Added Skull![/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk246/pwnedurmom/screenshots2.jpg[/img][/center] FAQ [quote="the soul"]Deltascape? looks like nothing was changed besides changing the dialogue as far as I can see.[/quote]
I download this server like a month ago, I don't know what versions are out now.. I removed the anti leech with out help. And I started learning how to use this. I've changed all the teleports to tele to city's and not open an interface like the old deltascape did (not hard) change you're login spot to lumby(also not hard) =S
*Features Added -A new quest to unlock a new shop and a new area. (Lame) -A ton of interfaces for 4/5 mini games -fully working barrows with dig, kc, and chest spawn. -60% caslte wars with correct interface(no pic) -fixed some glitches, 50% done fixing the following glitch to stop noclipping. -Edited 70% the Lunar gfx's and emotes. -Removed the Attack option out of wild. (appears in fight pits, c wars, and the wild.) *Client side - Added lunar to the client with the help of a tut - Added fully working login and log out with the help of a tut - Added peity and chiv with the help of a tut.
[quote="legend-scape"]i just do not no why delta released this source, too many people r using it now :([/quote]
Hey, I don't post thousands of topics asking how to do somthing with it. Plus by the time I'm done with it, it will look nothing like deltascape.

item.title: PwnedScape Revolution
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:10, topic:242753”][quote author=pwnedurmom link=topic=319074.msg2528829#msg2528829 date=1226354369]

The Souls correct, the dialogue is it.
Removing the ‘Anti-Leech’ statement, isn’t hard at all, and adding teleports and easy coding such as, are considered leeching.
Don’t worry, I believe if you try you can accomplish!

I also changed the lunar gfx’s and emotes and added interfaces for all the mini games.
(none of them were hard to do… But my point being is I’m changing the “look” of the server)

[/quote]

try making ur own serversource? instead of deltascape source its not hard takes upto 4+ months :],[/quote]
4+ months? I created my 317 in 6 hours. Over 500 replies atm. My 508, 2 days, almost 400 replies, my 377, 1 day, 250+ replies… Shit load of downloads to, so time isn’t a factor, just Java knowledge.

Read full topic

If you have nothing positive to say to me, then keep your mouth shut.

I also changed the lunar gfx’s and emotes and added interfaces for all the mini games.

I did make and handmade source once. It basicly took me too much time. I gave up, I decided i’d build on the best base released. (deltascape)

item.title: PwnedScape Revolution
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

I download this server like a month ago, I don’t know what versions are out now…
I removed the anti leech with out help. And I started learning how to use this.
I’ve changed all the teleports to tele to city’s and not open an interface like the old deltascape did (not hard)
change you’re login spot to lumby(also not hard)
=S

*Features Added -A new quest to unlock a new shop and a new area. (Lame) -A ton of interfaces for 4/5 mini games -fully working barrows with dig, kc, and chest spawn. -60% caslte wars with correct interface(no pic) -fixed some glitches, 50% done fixing the following glitch to stop noclipping. -Edited 70% the Lunar gfx's and emotes.

*Client side

  • Added lunar to the client with the help of a tut
  • Added fully working login and log out with the help of a tut
  • Added peity and chiv with the help of a tut.

item.title: PwnedScape Revolution
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

[center]PwnedScape Revolution![/center]
Note: I do use Deltascape, don’t care. I’ve added so much to it that I can say i coded at least 35% lol.

*Features Added
-A new quest to unlock a new shop and a new area. (Lame)
-A ton of interfaces for 4/5 mini games
-fully working barrows with dig, kc, and chest spawn.
-60% caslte wars with correct interface(no pic)
-fixed some glitches, 50% done fixing the following glitch to stop noclipping.
-Edited 70% the Lunar gfx’s and emotes.
-Removed the Attack option out of wild. (appears in fight pits, c wars, and the wild.)

*Client side

  • Added lunar to the client with the help of a tut
  • Added fully working login and log out with the help of a tut
  • Added peity and chiv with the help of a tut.

That’s all I can think right of now, I’ll post more Here are some pics!

*future to do list.
-Finish up CW
-Add full clan chat system(notice the sprite…)
-Add a few more quests.
-fix all the quest to make them longer and more detailed.
-Fix the rest of the following glitch

[center]Over all random pix[/center]
[center][/center]

[center]Interfaces…[/center]
[center][/center]

[center]Vengence Other Added Skull![/center]
[center][/center]

FAQ

the soul:

Deltascape? looks like nothing was changed besides changing the dialogue as far as I can see.

I download this server like a month ago, I don't know what versions are out now.. I removed the anti leech with out help. And I started learning how to use this. I've changed all the teleports to tele to city's and not open an interface like the old deltascape did (not hard) change you're login spot to lumby(also not hard) =S
*Features Added -A new quest to unlock a new shop and a new area. (Lame) -A ton of interfaces for 4/5 mini games -fully working barrows with dig, kc, and chest spawn. -60% caslte wars with correct interface(no pic) -fixed some glitches, 50% done fixing the following glitch to stop noclipping. -Edited 70% the Lunar gfx's and emotes. -Removed the Attack option out of wild. (appears in fight pits, c wars, and the wild.)

*Client side

  • Added lunar to the client with the help of a tut
  • Added fully working login and log out with the help of a tut
  • Added peity and chiv with the help of a tut.
legend-scape:

i just do not no why delta released this source, too many people r using it now

Hey, I don't post thousands of topics asking how to do somthing with it. Plus by the time I'm done with it, it will look nothing like deltascape.

Read full topic
